Articles.Content:
@Sylandro: looks good, how did you do to add new bodies to stock star system ?

There's a mod called PlanetFactory CE which allows you to create new planets.

The new version will be up next Saturday, and here's what's planned.

--

New moon for Wexx (complete!)

A Uranus analogue (complete!)

A Neptune analogue and a new Pluto analogue

Science!

Fixed gravity!

And Faz. http://imgur.com/a/RKPdE#0

(Faz won't have it's original texture, and heightmap, i contacted NovaSilsko about it, and he said he couldn't perhaps due to legal reasons. So i'll be using recreations of it)

Edited June 16, 2014 by Sylandro

The new version will be up next Saturday, and here's what's planned.

--

New moon for Wexx (complete!)

A Uranus analogue (complete!)

A Neptune analogue and a new Pluto analogue

Science!

Fixed gravity!

And Faz. http://imgur.com/a/RKPdE#0

(Faz won't have it's original texture, and heightmap, i contacted NovaSilsko about it, and he said he couldn't perhaps due to legal reasons. So i'll be using recreations of it)

Upon seeing this: "(in Monopoly's grandpa voice) I'm excited!" Yes in his voice.

this might be a load of a suggestion, but i have just gotta ask you if its possible if you can make this compatible with environmental visual enhancements (for planets w/ atmospheres). it will make it all the better:sticktongue:

this might be a load of a suggestion, but i have just gotta ask you if its possible if you can make this compatible with environmental visual enhancements (for planets w/ atmospheres). it will make it all the better:sticktongue:

Sorry man, no can do. But i'm planning on making a faint "halo" ring for Jool like on Jupiter.
I just returned from vacation and loaded your system. It looks fantastic, nice work!

Thanks!

Currently, i'm currently just beginning on work of EVE compatibility.
DP- EVE compatibility has been dropped, but i'm working on fixing the gravity; turns out; it was a mistake all on my part!

TP - Headbutt, and i'm listing all things planned in complete detail:

The new moon for Wexx, Standish, has a odd orbit that goes near Forun's orbit. Standish is very mountainous and has alot of flatlands! Be careful where you land!

Forun will be renamed to Huygens.

A Mimas and Iapetus analouges for Wexx

The Neptune analouge, Pippitus, and it's three moons. Tritus, Leird and Millfrey.

The Pluto analouge, Ploouto and it's two moons, Karion and Alia.

A new, comet-like tail for Belenus due to tidal flexion

A new 'gas giant' that is near Dres's orbit named Goliath. Good luck trying to return something off from there!
Sounds fantastic!
Release may come next friday. It's up to procrastination, though.
I will be watching for it...
Released postponed until next Saturday, sorry 'bout that!
DP - Some inspiration shots for Belenus just so you can get a idea of it's surface:
Today is Saturday
I don't like that this pack is so proprietary...
Sorry. I may release a new version, sooner or later.

This is in, uh, a bit of a pickle currently.

Planning on converting it to Kopernicus

Edited October 15, 2014 by Sylandro

This is in, uh, a bit of a pickle currently

waiting on kopernicus as well.

Very nice work btw.

some of mine

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/70018-The-Boris-System-Planet-Factory-CE-MOD%28-March-28th%29%28Planet-Packs%29%28STiLL-WORKS%21-23-5%29

let me know if you want to team up when kopernicus comes to fruition.
Alright. Nice work, man!
Doublepost: I may redo this when PFCE gets updated, but currently, i don't know where this mod is going.

TriplePost: I've been working on a Kopernicus version of JoolPlus.

Say hello to the new Wexx! The texture has been changed to be more Saturn-like, and there will be more moons, too!
Talk to _Augustus_ about converting to PF:CE Revived, so you can get more attention.

Talk to _Augustus_ about converting to PF:CE Revived, so you can get more attention.

I'll try to.

Meanwhile, i made a new moon that orbits in Wexx's rings, Rocko, and some details for the outer planets. The surface of Rocko is WIP, but it's fun to land on due to it's low gravity.

Eeloo is now a centaur-like object.

And Jool now has a halo ring.

A screenshot of the W.I.P surface of Rocko, with Wexx in the distance.

DP -

More dev shots. Rocko is complete! And it's redder than ever. Merry christmas!
